His face is not visible as he is leaning forward, concentrating on his task. The intricate details and colors of the crabs are quite vivid against the brown interior of the cardboard box.

In his environment, he is surrounded by water, indicative of a coastal or estuarine area, where crabbing is common. The background is blurred but shows a relatively calm water surface and hints of aquatic farming structures, perhaps for raising shellfish or other marine animals.
